name: Geomagic 3D Wrap File
summary: Learn about .WRP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Geomagic was previously known as Raindrop Geomagic.

description: Proprietary 3D modeling format used by Geomagic DSSP (digital shape sampling and processing) software; may contain point clouds, polygonal models, mesh models, CAD models, curves, datums, NURBS data, and other features.
